name: teamon
description: Unified desktop app for team communications and collaborations.

scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . teamon --out=release/win --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.35.0 --icon=assets/win/teamon.ico --prune --ignore=release --ignore=assets --ignore=tool --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=packager.json --ignore=README.md --ignore="\.?tags.*" --ignore LICENSE --ignore="node_modules/.bin/(asar|electron.*)" --ignore="script/[a-zA-Z]*\.js"
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && npm run asar:win && electron-builder release/win/teamon-win32-x64 --platform=win --out=release/win --config=packager.json
scripts.asar:osx: asar pack release/osx/teamon-osx/resources/app release/osx/teamon-osx/resources/app.asar && rm -rf release/osx/teamon-osx/resources/app
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . teamon --out=release/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.35.0 --ignore=release --ignore=assets --ignore=tool --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=packager.json --ignore=README.md --ignore="\.?tags.*" --ignore LICENSE --ignore="node_modules/.bin/(asar|electron.*)" --ignore="script/[a-zA-Z]*\.js"
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build:osx && npm run asar:osx && electron-builder release/osx/teamon-osx --platform=osx --out=release/osx --config=packager.json

author: Solution-Global
